trends: There have been no other sightings in Bostwick
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Wife seen first(6-8). told me to look, seen multiple with more appearing.
divs: Sighting DetailsWife went out to the car to get her wallet. She looked NW across sod field and told me that she seen 6-8 redish orange lights flashing and hovering. she got me to come outside and look. when i looked there were only two. suddenly one went straight up a little bit then did a 90 degree turn left and took off really fast. it disappeared. then the other one had another one come out of it. it went straight up for a little while. then the stationary one started to go up at the same rate of speed as the other one. then they both shot straight up and were gone.
